original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Nippapañcavagga
analyzed: nippa pañca vagga

original: 4. Lokenatthibhāvapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, dissanti loke buddhā, dissanti paccekabuddhā, dissanti tathāgatassa
analyzed: bhante nāgasena dissanti loke buddhāḥ dissanti paccekabuddhāḥ dissanti tathāgatassa

original: sāvakā, dissanti cakkavattirājāno, dissanti padesarājāno, dissanti devamanussā, dissanti
analyzed: sāvakāḥ dissanti cakkavatti rājānaḥ dissanti padesa rājānaḥ dissanti deva manussāḥ dissanti

original: sadhanā, dissanti adhanā, dissanti sugatā, dissanti duggatā, dissati purisassa itthiliṅgaṁ
analyzed: sa dhanāḥ dissanti adhanāḥ dissanti sugatāḥ dissanti duggatāḥ dissati purisassa

original: pātubhūtaṁ, dissati itthiyā purisaliṅgaṁ pātubhūtaṁ, dissati sukataṁ dukkataṁ kammaṁ,
analyzed: pātubhūta dissati itthiyā purisa liṅgam pātubhūta dissati sukatam dukkatam kamma

original: dissanti kalyāṇapāpakānaṁ kammānaṁ vipākūpabhogino sattā, atthi loke sattā aṇḍajā
analyzed: dissanti kalyāṇa pāpakānam kammānam vipāka upabhoginaḥ sattāḥ atthi loke sattāḥ aṇḍa jā

original: jalābujā saṁsedajā opapātikā, atthi sattā apadā dvipadā catuppadā bahuppadā, atthi
analyzed: jalābu jā saseda jā opapātikā atthi sattā apadā dvipadā catuppadā bahuppadā atthi

original: loke yakkhā rakkhasā kumbhaṇḍā asurā dānavā gandhabbā petā pisācā, atthi kinnarā
analyzed: loke yakkhā rakkhasā kumbhaṇḍāḥ asurā dānavāḥ gandhabbā petā pisācāḥ atthi kinnarā

original: mahoragā nāgā supaṇṇā siddhā vijjādharā, atthi hatthī assā gāvo mahiṁsā oṭṭhā gadrabhā
analyzed: mahoragā nāgā supaṇṇā siddhā vijjādharā atthi hatthī assāḥ gāvaḥ mahisāḥ oṭṭhāḥ gadrabhāḥ

original: ajā eḷakā migā sūkarā sīhā byagghā dīpī acchā kokā taracchā soṇā siṅgālā, atthi bahuvidhā
analyzed: ajāḥ eḷakāḥ migā sūkarā sīhāḥ byagghāḥ dīpī acchā kokā taracchā soṇā siṅgālāḥ atthi bahuvidhā

original: sakuṇā, atthi suvaṇṇaṁ rajataṁ muttā maṇi saṅkho silā pavāḷaṁ lohitaṅko masāragallaṁ
analyzed: sakuṇā atthi suvaṇṇam rajatam muttā maṇi saṅkhaḥ silā pavāḷam lohitaṅkaḥ masāragalla

original: veḷuriyo vajiraṁ phalikaṁ kāḷalohaṁ tambalohaṁ vaṭṭalohaṁ kaṁsalohaṁ, atthi khomaṁ
analyzed: veḷuriyaḥ vajiram phalikam kāḷa loham tamba loham vaṭṭa loham kasa loha atthi khoma

original: koseyyaṁ kappāsikaṁ sāṇaṁ bhaṅgaṁ kambalaṁ, atthi sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu kudrūso varako
analyzed: koseyyam kappāsikam sāṇam bhaṅgam kambala atthi sāli vīhi yavaḥ kaṅgu kudrūsaḥ varakaḥ

original: godhūmo muggo, māso tilaṁ kulatthaṁ, atthi mūlagandho sāragandho pheggugandho tacagandho
analyzed: godhūmaḥ muggaḥ māsaḥ tilam kulattha atthi mūla gandho sāra gandho pheggu gandho taca gandho

original: pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho sabbagandho, atthi tiṇalatāgaccharukkhaosadhivanappatinadīpabbatasamuddamacchakacchapā sabbaṁ loke atthi.
analyzed: patta gandho puppha gandho phala gandho sabba gandho atthi tiṇa latā gaccha rukkha osadhi vanappati nadī pabbata samudda maccha kacchapā sabbam loke atthi

original: Yaṁ, bhante, loke natthi, taṁ me kathehī”ti.
analyzed: ya bhante loke na atthi tam me kathehi iti

original: “Tīṇimāni, mahārāja, loke natthi.
analyzed: tīṇi imāni mahā rāja loke na atthi

original: Katamāni tīṇi?
analyzed: katamāni tīṇi

original: Sacetanā vā acetanā vā ajarāmarā loke natthi, saṅkhārānaṁ niccatā natthi, paramatthena sattūpaladdhi natthi, imāni kho, mahārāja, tīṇi loke natthī”ti.
analyzed: sa cetanāḥ vā acetanāḥ vā ajara amarāḥ loke natthi saṅkhārānam nicca tā natthi paramatthena sattu upaladdhi natthi imāni kho mahā rāja tīṇi loke natthi iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Loke natthibhāvapañho catuttho.
analyzed: loke natthi bhāva pañho catuttho
